name: the Lost House - Alpha Demo
description:
Enter a world where Fear is power. Play as Sawyer as she traverses the treacherous Lost House, full of monstrous Forgotten and evil Spirits. Find the Lost and bring back the people of the small town of St. Cloud. Make new friends and use your fear-based powers to brave through this haunted mansion to save your parents. 

 Enjoy the first look of a new RPG from a new indie team at their first attempt at game development. With gameplay inspired by Dark Cloud, Ao Oni and the Legend of Dragoon; and a story inspired by Persona, the works of Edgar Allan Poe, and Stephen King--take a dive into the first few levels and save St. Cloud!

November 3, 2022
